thread.title: For Sale: $6.9M glass house in Kelowna, with a stunning pool and beachfront property | National Post
thread.title_full: For Sale: $6.9M glass house in Kelowna, with a stunning pool and beachfront property | National Post

author: National Post Staff
title: For Sale: $6.9M glass house in Kelowna, with a stunning pool and beachfront property | National Post
text:
• Jane Hoffman, Coldwell Banker, 250.860.7500 • See full listing here 
The negative edge pool seems to merge with the lake below. 
The kitchen, like most rooms in the house, offers stunning views of the water. 
Imagine waking up to the sunrise here… 
A good place for a deep soak. 
There are plenty of decks and, of course, there’s an outdoor kitchen too. 
If you have an interesting listing, reno or just a really neat home — whether it’s for sale or not, . Related
